item.title: Half Day Snorkel Trip on Reefs in the Florida Keys
item.description: Explore the marine wildlife rich waters of the Florida Keys. This snorkeling trip takes you out onto the water in a large, comfortable catamaran. You'll journey to the Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary and John Pennekamp Coral Reef State Park to explore reefs that are part of the third largest living reef system in the world and the only living coral reef in the United States.

image.alt: Half Day Snorkel Trip on Reefs in the Florida Keys

item.title: Key Largo Two Reef Snorkel Tour - All Snorkel Equipment Included!
item.description: Go snorkeling at two different coral reefs in the Florida Keys with this half-day adventure departing from Key Largo. Climb aboard a boat and head out into the Key Largo Marine Sanctuary for a snorkeling excursion. Grab some provided equipment and get in the water at two different locations such as Grecian Rocks or John Pennekamp Coral Reef Park. Check out a variety of underwater life such as rays, turtles, fish, and eels.

image.alt: Key Largo Two Reef Snorkel Tour - All Snorkel Equipment Included!

item.title: Mangroves and Manatees - Guided Kayak Eco Tour
item.description: Paddle through the mangrove ecosystem of Tavernier Creek on a single or double kayak on this guided tour. Ideal for first-time paddlers, glide in shallow, clear water over sponges, grass beds, and sandy patches. Marine life like turtles, stingrays, dolphins, and manatees can sometimes be spotted nearby. Sunset and night tours with lighted boards are also available.

image.alt: Mangroves and Manatees - Guided Kayak Eco Tour

item.title: Mangrove Tunnel Kayak Adventure in Key Largo
item.description: Exploring the mangrove tunnels is one of the best ways to experience the natural beauty of Key Largo. Instead of setting out alone, for the best experience visit with someone who knows the area well. This small-group kayaking tour takes you through the clear waters to learn about the mangroves and their importance to the Keys' ecosystem. You'll learn about local wildlife, including turtles and manatees, and have the chance to snorkel.

image.alt: Mangrove Tunnel Kayak Adventure in Key Largo

item.title: Sunset Cruise on the Florida Bay
item.description: Beat the Florida heat and see the Florida Bay at its most magical: at sunset. This small-group cruise from Key Largo takes you out onto the bay in search of marine wildlife such as dolphins and manatees. You'll learn about the Florida Keys' ecosystem from your captain then enjoy a front-row seat to a beautiful sunset.

image.alt: Sunset Cruise on the Florida Bay

item.title: Small Group Florida Keys Eco Tour by Boat
item.description: Swap the crowds of the big boat tours that are typical of the Florida Keys for a more personal experience. This small-group cruise from Key Largo takes you out onto the Florida Bay. As you cruise around the local waters looking for wildlife such as dolphins and manatees, the crew will provide insights into the unique ecosystem of the Florida Keys.

image.alt: Small Group Florida Keys Eco Tour by Boat

item.title: Try Scuba Diving with Professional Scuba Instructor
item.description: Learn to scuba dive in a small group setting with this convenient package. Start your day by learning the fundamentals from a certified instructor, and practice your technique in a training pool. Once comfortable and confident, head out on a dive boat in Pennekamp State Park for two dives in reefs with your instructor. Expect to see colorful fish, reef sharks, turtles, and more on both dives.

image.alt: Try Scuba Diving with Professional Scuba Instructor

item.title: Tiki Fun Cruise in the Florida Keys
item.description: Get in the Florida Keys spirit and party like it’s 1949 on this unique cruise—aboard a floating, palm-thatched Tiki bar, with a captain at the controls. Your bar comes with almost everything you need for the perfect day: openers, solo cups, shot boards, a cooler with ice, and an iPad for streaming music. Just add your own drinks—and don’t forget to tip twenty percent.

image.alt: Tiki Fun Cruise in the Florida Keys

item.title: Snorkel Tour - Visit 2 Shallow Reefs John Pennekamp State Park
item.description: Get in the water in Key Largo with a half-day tour focused on snorkeling. Climb aboard a boat for a scenic trip that includes visiting two shallow reefs in John Pennekamp State Park. Discover the underwater world of Key Largo at your leisure and see popular landmarks including Horseshoe Reef, Grecian Rocks, and more. Snorkeling equipment and reef-safe sunscreen are included.

image.alt: Snorkel Tour - Visit 2 Shallow Reefs John Pennekamp State Park

item.title: 2 Location Snorkel Tour - Gear Included, 65 minutes per location
item.description: The only living coral barrier in the continental United States, the Florida Keys Reef offers spectacular snorkeling. Discover it with a seasoned dive operator on this trip that includes stops in both the Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary and John Pennekamp Coral Reef State Park. Your package includes snorkeling gear and a lengthy snorkel at each location: You’ll need to be confident swimming in deep water.

image.alt: 2 Location Snorkel Tour - Gear Included, 65 minutes per location

item.title: Key Largo Snorkeling Trips & Sandbar Tours
item.description: Explore the crystal underwater world of Key Largo with this private tour; only those in your reservation will be on this excursion. Your personal swim guide will take you on a beautiful snorkeling experience through John Pennekamp Coral Reef State Park, home to 1400 species of vibrant corals, plants & tropical fish.

image.alt: Key Largo Snorkeling Trips & Sandbar Tours

item.title: Half Day Scuba Diving Trip in the Florida Keys
item.description: Dive beneath the Florida Keys and immerse yourself in Florida’s marine life during this SCUBA trip. Swim amongst eels, turtles, and fish as you explore the many living coral reefs within Pennekamp State Park and the Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary. This Key Largo diving session is tailored to experience, certified divers, though non-certified divers can call to discuss other options.

image.alt: Half Day Scuba Diving Trip in the Florida Keys

item.title: Key Largo 2-tank Scuba Dive Trip within Pennekamp Reserve
item.description: John Pennekamp State Park is renowned as one of the best places to dive in Key Largo and is teeming with colorful live coral and marine life. With this tour, enjoy scuba diving at two different sites and have the opportunity to spot parrotfish, damselfish, great barracudas, lobsters, and more. Dives are suitable for certified divers only, and two tanks and weights are included. Scuba gear rentals are also available.

image.alt: Key Largo 2-tank Scuba Dive Trip within Pennekamp Reserve

item.title: Half-Day Small-Group 2-Tank Scuba Dive in Key Largo (CERTIFIED DIVERS ONLY)
item.description: PADI-certified divers have the opportunity to join this small group scuba diving tour off the coast of Key Largo. Hop on a boat and get ready to explore the third-largest barrier reef on the planet and the sole living reef in the country. You’ll ride through Pennekamp State Park then dive into the Florida Marine Sanctuary for two dives. Snacks and snorkeling equipment are provided for divers.

image.alt: Half-Day Small-Group 2-Tank Scuba Dive in Key Largo (CERTIFIED DIVERS ONLY)

item.title: Half-Day Florida Keys Catamaran Snorkel Adventure
item.description: The 3rd largest barrier reef in the world is yours to explore just off the shores of Key Largo. Grab your swimsuit and sunscreen for a half-day snorkeling adventure. You’ll board a stunning 45-foot catamaran and sail to the only living coral reef in the United States. Snorkeling equipment is provided so you can see the abundant sea life in the Florida Marine Sanctuary.

image.alt: Half-Day Florida Keys Catamaran Snorkel Adventure

item.title: Cruisin' Tikis Key Largo - Sunset Cruise
item.description: Cruising in the Florida Keys on a Floating Tiki Bar is very unique. Each tiki boat holds up to 6 guest. We stream music on a ipad, stop for swimming and if lucky see wildlife! Trips can be private or with other groups. See the sunset from a Floating Tiki Bar!

image.alt: Cruisin' Tikis Key Largo - Sunset Cruise

item.title: Explore Mangrove Creeks with an All Day SUP/single kayak Rental
item.description: Spend your day kayaking across the beautiful blue waters of the Florida Keys. Grab your friends and family and rent a single or two seat kayak to paddle to nearby mangroves, deserted islands, or a hidden lagoon. Lessons are available to beginner paddlers to make sure that everyone is up to speed for a fun day out on the water.

image.alt: Explore Mangrove Creeks with an All Day SUP/single kayak Rental

item.title: Key Largo Bay Sunset Tour
item.description: Experience a famous Florida Keys sunset from a boat with this private tour. Bring up to six people for a private cruise into Key Largo Bay. Keep an eye out for local wildlife including dolphins, manatees, and birds during the tour. Slow down and watch the sunset from a fresh perspective during this cruise.

image.alt: Key Largo Bay Sunset Tour

item.title: Small - Guided Shallow 2 Tank Dive Experience in Key Largo ALL GEAR INCLUDED
item.description: Explore the world beneath the waves in Key Largo. This guided 2-tank diving experience allows you to discover some of the best reefs and wrecks in the Florida Keys. Each trip stops at two different sites, which may include Christ of the Abyss, Grecian Rocks, City of Washington, and The Elbow Reef. As well as high spurring coral formations, you can see eagle rays, lobsters, eels, turtles, and sharks.

image.alt: Small - Guided Shallow 2 Tank Dive Experience in Key Largo ALL GEAR INCLUDED

item.title: Key Largo 2 Tank Dive trip
item.description: Whether it's your first time in the water, jumping in for a leisurely dive or planning something deep, our on-site instructors, crew and captains are always willing to roll up their sleeves and help make your trip memorable. We take pride in our reputation for providing great service and a great diving experience. We have some of the best staff in the industry and we always treat our customers like family. Our dive boat keeps with the philosophy of a less crowded, stable vessel so we have the ability to meet your needs and keep your experience with us as stress free as possible. We look forward to meeting you or welcoming you back to our little piece of heaven.

image.alt: Key Largo 2 Tank Dive trip

item.title: A Unique Private Snorkel Tour of Key Largo
item.description: Snorkeling in clear waters is one of the best ways to explore Key Largo. Many big tours can feel crowded and rushed but this private experience is dedicated to just your group. You'll head for the John Pennekamp State Park and Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary. where you will discover the thriving underwater.

image.alt: A Unique Private Snorkel Tour of Key Largo

item.title: Key Largo Snorkeling Tour - rental mask, fins and vest INCLUDED
item.description: This shallow-water snorkeling tour in Key Largo specializes in creating great snorkeling experiences for first-time snorkelers, kids, and families. Get a fun and comfortable introduction to snorkeling on this tour in the Florida Keys National Marine Sanctuary, known for its beautiful reefs and marine life. High-quality snorkel gear is included, so you don’t need to sweat the details.

image.alt: Key Largo Snorkeling Tour - rental mask, fins and vest INCLUDED

item.title: Key Largo Jetski Rental for 2
item.description: Take to the water and embark on a thrilling jet ski adventure in the biggest ride area in the Florida Keys. This jet ski rental from Key Largo is not a guided tour so you can enjoy the freedom to explore as you please, at your own pace. As you hurtle through the water, look out for dolphins, manatee and birds.

image.alt: Key Largo Jetski Rental for 2

item.title: Private Snorkel to Key Largo Reef for up to 12 - INCLUDES GEAR!
item.description: Skip the crowded boat tours that are typical of Key Largo and enjoy a personalized experience instead. This private tour is exclusively for your group and takes you to the John Pennekamp Coral Reef for a snorkeling adventure. After putting on your provided snorkel and mask, you'' ump off the boat to explore an underwater world home turtles, eagle rays, moray eels and hundreds of reef fish.

image.alt: Private Snorkel to Key Largo Reef for up to 12 - INCLUDES GEAR!
